author: Laurent Shinar
title: Pawdorable Bear Pics To Keep You Warm Through Your Winter Hibernation - Animal Comedy - Animal Comedy, funny animals, animal gifs
text: With the days being made up mostly of night at this point in the year, many of us hoomans begin to become jealous of our [furry animal friends](https://cheezburger.com/23157509/25-funny-animal-memes-that-will-make-you-say-if-not-friend-why-friend-shape) who have had enough of the winter and decide to hibernate through it instead. It is such a calling that many of us spend several extra hours in bed through this season in the hopes of mimicking our animal friends. Which is why we make today's list all about [pawdorable bear pics](https://cheezburger.com/22701317/pawdorable-positive-polar-bear-memes-frozen-freshly-in-the-arctic-to-refresh-you-for-the-weekend) that can keep you warm through your winter hibernation. From fresh cubs exploring the outside world for the first time, to [bear families kicking it](https://cheezburger.com/22796549/adorable-bear-pics-that-are-sweet-as-honey-and-siily-like-baloo-for-a-healthy-dose-of-bear) in the forest, to the most pawdorable little bear cub butts, to bear mamas supporting their precious fur babies, these wholesome bear pics will be more than enough to keep you warm all winter long or at least until you awake from your hooman hibernation. [Sign up for our newsletter for a daily dose of hissterical cats and feel-good felines!](https://icanhascheezburger.beehiiv.com/subscribe?utm_source=web&utm_medium=intro&utm_campaign=marielintro) Now this is the kind of goals that we want to be striving for. Does this not look like the most cosiest, cuddliest and wholesome nap that has ever been taken by any species of animal? Here is to hoping that this weekend we all get to indulge in such a heartwarming activity. The face you make when you realise you have done something naughty but you have no intention to do anything about it, so you sit and hope that no one realises what you have done. If only the similarities between hoomans and bears stretched a little further than this and we could all join in the yearly hibernation. Check out our Love our stuff? Shop for some of our pawsome merch [here](https://store.cheezburger.com).
